article.title: List of ZeroMe Hubs
article.text:
To use [[zerome|ZeroMe]] you need to choose a Hub. Many hubs offer very limited user space which may cause issues for you when you hit the limit.

The list of hubs below includes the user size limit.

Hubs with sufficient user space:
- [zero://1ABFCaadiEa3bFNzN3RcCZSsviqMNTbz3m 无限额度hub] 10YB (yottabyte) size limit
- [zero://1DSr6bv2DNVBCrFAMVCdCETWiWzeVTrjNY NSA (No Strings Attached) Hub] 1GB size limit
- [zero://1CouTPX7rK6cyffPCyyxttdZhB1u7NPtqz ZeroHub] 1GB size limit
- [zero://1KNmG5rJUGhgUJGFbLkv2B5isaqu9PrZqi AmethystHub] 524MB size limit
- [zero://1MATTnuthfsvTUqEwtvTR6nMiLmtqGXyfv Religion] 90MB size limit
- [zero://1LQeBa8AgXPd9YXyfTGm9FbcJZTM4p1vgY The Great Dane Hub] 26MB size limit
- [zero://149fpM31r6YUc7WZ1m28Lq6Ef3zwdBFKBq PolskiHub] 20MB size limit
- [zero://185yXNL48LTZyKfNo6WgyKshtMgcV3mecL Icf20's Hub] 20MB size limit
- [zero://15mV5T1R1wxg3E1FPsvZw19bw6QzvRREfn Hub Español] 10MB size limit
- [zero://hub.kaffie.bit KaffieHub] 10MB size limit
- [zero://16bNGdxFkGWGnCEfVue3w4CSp3Ew2hcyBB Trump 2016] 10MB size limit

Hubs with limited user space:
- [zero://1CiGGh6RrTtaTJfutVKUrfURsP5J4stJDk Anarcho Capitalism] 60kB size limit
- [zero://1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v OrangeHub] 60kB size limit
- [zero://1ARSTRDgMSH2E81pcZCbaEq28TZ72Levxh OrangeIsTheNewBlack Hub] 60kB size limit
- [zero://1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL RedHub] 60kB size limit
- [zero://1White24UrrwQrD86o6Vrc1apgZ1x1o51 WhiteHub] 60kB size limit
- [zero://1AbRRDveQD5EFtmXxBqQfS1guUWXxytMJZ Torrents Hub] 50kB size limit
- [zero://1D7xb8vwnWUYSXziENcnoi3meD5Gk2xgFj True red hub] 50kB size limit
- [zero://18FheQ1v3bz4iv5yx8hr9hg5W5BJ8WNJ8d YellowHub 1] 50kB size limit
- [zero://1GnSLuqqmB8oRAJ4SK4hvzt6Jo1qAnEbXn YellowHub 2] 50kB size limit
- [zero://12FimaEjAmux74HtTGzcRQA1PqKiWjCczT RusHub] 50kB size limit
- [zero://1N9sU8qh3S4ei9PHE1qQyYPbcckJomvwMd ChameleonHub] 50kB size limit
- [zero://12rTbtzcEZH7RiVfShBB3qhoe3rfwbpm8S Bitcoin] 50kB size limit
- [zero://1BLueGvui1GdbtsjcKqCf4F67uKfritG49 BlueHub] 50kB size limit
